delve.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to try to find more information about someone or something
delve.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: research that delves deeply into this issue
delve.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to search for something by putting your hand deeply into a bag, container etc
delve.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: He delved into his pocket and brought out a notebook.
